Title: What is Decision Intelligence?
Description: Decision intelligence is the new discipline of data science that combines data science, social science, and managerial science into a unified field. This article acts as a beginner’s guide to this new trend in data science, making it one of the latest data science articles you must read.

Title: Data Science’s Most Misunderstood Hero
Description: This article speaks about the importance of data skills, paired with a new perspective, making it number 2 in our best data science articles list.

Title: Statistics for people in a hurry
Description: This is one of such data science news article that explains all the biggest ideas in statistics in a much simpler way.

Title: What on Earth is Data Science?
Description: If you are a novice in the field, who is interested in diving into the world of data science, here is another must-read. This is one of those articles about data science that’ll break down the data science complexities like a piece of cake.

Title: What’s the difference between analytics and statistics?
Description: This article beautifully explains the difference between the two most important branches of data science – analytics and statistics. It will help you in understanding the core concepts as well as the implementation of these two different branches.

Title: The simplest explanation of machine learning you’ll ever read
Description: If you are a beginner who has heard about Machine Learning (ML), but doesn’t have a complete understanding of it, you will love this piece of work. This article has all that you need to know about ML as a beginner, which makes it number 6 in our list of data science articles.

Title: Why businesses fail at machine learning
Description: This article explains the reasons why businesses fail to implement Machine Learning successfully in their operations. Must read if you’re super into Machine Learning implementation and want to understand the business aspect of it.

Title: Data-Driven? Think again
Description: People often get confused between data-driven and data-inspired. This data science review article will clear this confusion for you.

Title: Great Learning PG Program in Data Science & Business Analytics
Description: This program provides skilled education in data science and business analytics with online classes and project support from experienced faculty.

The institute’s job-oriented training assists students in cracking a large number of interviews and obtaining the greatest employment role in the organization.

Title: Analytix Labs Certification Course in Data Science
Description: AnalytixLabs offers high-quality training programs designed by industry specialists, focusing on fundamental and advanced analytics abilities with hands-on workshops and real-world case studies.

Title: ISB Institute of Data Science Advanced Management Program
Description: This program provides vast knowledge in data science, allowing students to acquire global leadership skills and develop competitive advantage using modern data-driven methods.

Title: DataTrained PG Program In Data Science And ML
Description: This program includes Excel foundations, statistical concepts, and develops programming abilities for data science, focusing on skills for machine learning engineer, data analyst, and beginner data engineer profiles.

Title: Techstack Academy Data Science Certification
Description: This course includes 55 modules covering fundamentals of data science through simulation and real-time projects, providing in-depth knowledge of subjects like data and analytics, statistics basics, and python fundamentals.

Title: Udemy Data Science A-Z
Description: This course provides a well-rounded introduction to key data science concepts, covering introductory to advanced topics like Python, machine learning, statistics, and data visualization.

Title: Coursera IBM Data Science Professional Certificate
Description: This specialization offers in-depth knowledge and industry-relevant skills in data science, machine learning, AI, and data analytics through structured learning and practical projects.

Title: Simplilearn Applied Data Science With Python
Description: This program assists students in developing a holistic understanding of Data Science and its functions in the real world, including live instructor-led training, workshops, and project work.

Title: Physics Wallah Full Stack Data Science Pro Course
Description: This course equips learners with end-to-end expertise across the data science lifecycle, covering data exploration, engineering, machine learning, deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing.

Title: Future Learn Applied Data Science
Description: This free online course delves into essential aspects of applied data science, covering terminology, visualization techniques, geolocation data utilization, feature extraction, clustering text, and machine learning application to text and images.

Title: IBM Data Science Professional Certificate (Free)
Description: This comprehensive specialization consists of 9 courses covering data science fundamentals, tools, methodology, Python, databases, SQL, and data visualization, concluding with a capstone project.

Title: Alison Introduction to Data Science
Description: This course provides a fundamental understanding of data science processes, machine learning, data models, and knowledge extraction from unstructured and structured data.

Title: Skillshare Data Science and Machine Learning with Python
Description: This course covers essential data science topics including multivariate regression, ensemble learning, and Python fundamentals.

Title: SAS
Description: One of the oldest data science tools, specifically designed for statistical operations, advanced analytics, business intelligence (BI), and data management. It enables users to integrate, cleanse, prepare, and manipulate data.

Title: Tableau
Description: A data visualization software that assists in data analysis and creating engaging presentations. It helps present analyzed data in an interesting and understandable way and can visualize geographical data.

Title: TensorFlow
Description: Developed by Google, TensorFlow is an open-source Python library used for establishing and training data science models, with applications in speech recognition, image classification, and drug discovery.

Title: BigML
Description: A fully interactable, cloud-based GUI environment that reduces platform dependencies for processing machine learning algorithms, specializing in predictive modeling.

Title: Knime
Description: An open-source platform with an easy-to-use Graphical User Interface (GUI) that assists in data extraction, transformation, and analysis, usable with minimum programming expertise.

Title: RapidMiner
Description: A popular data science tool known for providing a secure and scalable environment for data preparation and performing various data science tasks like text mining, predictive analysis, and real-time tracking.

Title: Excel
Description: A part of Microsoft Office, used by beginners for data representation and analysis, allowing formulas, functions, and powerful data visuals and spreadsheets.

Title: Apache Hadoop
Description: A data science tool integrated with business intelligence that allows connecting to different data sources, visualizing data in dashboards and reports, and sharing them.

Title: PowerBI
Description: A data science tool integrated with business intelligence, which can be combined with other Microsoft data science tools for data visualization and generating insightful reports and dashboards.

Title: DataRobot
Description: An AI-driven, ML-integrated automation platform that aids in developing accurate predictive models, capable of carrying out a wide range of machine learning algorithms.

Title: MongoDB
Description: A relational database management system that makes data storage and retrieval easy, storing data in JSON-like format as documents and enabling increased data availability for big data.

Title: Python
Description: One of the most popular languages for machine learning, known for its simple syntax, versatility, and ability to perform mathematical, statistical, and scientific calculations.

Title: Minitab
Description: A one-stop solution for data manipulation and analysis, allowing identification of trends and patterns in unstructured datasets, and automation of data science calculations and graph generation.

Title: R
Description: A highly scalable software specifically for statistical analysis and programming, capable of data clustering, statistical modeling, data cleaning, and visualization effectively.

Title: QlikView
Description: Known for its business intelligence capabilities, it analyzes multiple things at once by deriving relationships from unstructured data and visually representing analyzed data with fast in-memory processing.

Title: Google Analytics
Description: One of the most popular data science tools in digital marketing, used by marketers to understand customer behavior and Browse patterns for strategic marketing decisions.

Title: MATLAB
Description: An enterprise-focused data science tool and a multi-paradigm numerical computing environment for processing mathematical information, facilitating matrix functions, algorithmic implementation, and statistical modelling.

Title: Julia
Description: A programming language designed specifically for data science, known for its math-friendly syntax, automatic memory management, and ability to perform complex statistical calculations quickly.

Title: D3.js
Description: Enables users to generate dynamic and interactive expressions from raw datasets directly within web browsers, with features for manipulating and linking data with HTML/SVG/CSS elements.

Title: Matplotlib
Description: A powerful software with tools for generating everything from stationary graphs to interactive displays, well-suited for line and scatter plots, and offering various export options.

Title: Jupyter
Description: An open-source web-based application supporting numerous programming languages, ideal for researchers engaged in extensive work including data analysis and machine learning.

Title: NLTK
Description: Empowers data science experts by providing powerful features for language modeling, sentiment analysis, and named entity recognition, converting data into meaningful pieces for easier reading comprehension.

Title: Scikit-learn
Description: One of the most capable machine-learning libraries for Python, with powerful tool sets focusing on classifications, regressions, and other areas, allowing implementation of various ML models.

Title: Weka
Description: Focuses on important areas of data interpretation, such as preprocessing techniques and classification options, with a clear GUI ideal for simultaneous use by teams.

Title: Microsoft HD Insights
Description: Excels at delivering managed data for efficient processing and analysis of massive datasets in various programming languages, using different tools in an organized environment.

Title: IBM SPSS
Description: A powerful software suite employed in performing different statistical analyses, like predictive modeling and data management, with extensive features for hypothesizing-testing or advanced analytics functions.

Title: Keras
Description: An outstanding tool that helps create and train neural networks with ease through its user-friendly interface, offering simplified processes to build intricate deep-learning models.

Title: NumPy
Description: Provides support for large, multi-dimensional arrays and matrices, along with mathematical functions for efficient operations, widely used in data analysis, numerical computing, and machine learning.

Title: Pandas
Description: A powerful data manipulation and analysis library for Python, providing DataFrames for efficient handling and analysis of structured data.

Title: PyTorch
Description: A deep learning framework widely used for building and training neural networks, offering dynamic computational graphs for flexible model development and experimentation.

Title: SciPy
Description: A library for scientific computing in Python that offers a collection of algorithms and functions for numerical optimization, integration, interpolation, signal processing, and linear algebra.

Title: GPT-3
Description: A software language model developed by OpenAI, built as a testament to AI’s natural language processing capabilities, capable of generating human-like content.

Title: Amazon SageMaker
Description: A cloud-based machine learning platform by AWS, simplifying the end-to-end process of building, training, and deploying machine learning models at scale, with a user-friendly interface and AutoML capabilities.

Title: AlphaCode
Description: A free transformer-based language model that can help users learn different programming languages and generate large-scale code.

Title: Azure Cognitive Services
Description: A suite of AI tools from Microsoft designed to incorporate powerful AI capabilities into applications, offering APIs for computer vision, speech recognition, and language understanding.

Title: H2O.ai
Description: An open-source AI platform that uses AutoML to automate the machine learning process, simplifying model creation from data preprocessing to deployment.

Title: Bardeen
Description: An AI automation platform that saves time through rapid and efficient task completion, using OpenAI technologies to generate emails, social media posts, or other creative content.

Title: Descript
Description: A cloud-supported audio and video editing software that includes AI technology for multi-track editing and transcription capabilities.

Title: Designs.ai
Description: An AI design tool that enhances creativity with the help of artificial intelligence, featuring a logo maker, video maker, AI writer, and more.

Title: ChatSonic
Description: Offers extensive features for AI article/blog composing, text expansion, interpretation, and product description creation, pushing past ChatGPT restrictions.

Title: GitHub
Description: An open-source and cloud-based Git repository hosting service with a web-based graphical interface, used for collaboration on projects and managing revisions.

Title: Sublime Text
Description: A text editor for prose, code, and markup, offering advanced features like simultaneous editing for developers to control multiple cursors.

Title: HackerRank
Description: A website that offers coding challenges and competitions in various programming languages, including Python, for practicing data science and machine learning skills.

Title: Project Euler
Description: A website that offers a collection of challenging mathematical and computational problems for practicing Python skills in data structures, algorithms, and mathematical computations.

Title: GitHub (Exercises)
Description: GitHub is a repository of open-source projects and scripts that can be used for data science. You can find many data science projects and tutorials written in Python.

Title: LeetCode
Description: A website that offers coding challenges and competitions in various programming languages, including Python, for practicing data structures, algorithms, and mathematical computations.

Title: Google Code-in
Description: A competition for pre-university students to contribute to open-source projects, allowing practice of Python skills by contributing to data science projects.

Title: 365 Data Science Practice Exams
Description: Provides practice exams to help you prepare for data science certifications and assess your knowledge.

Title: 101 Pandas Exercises Python
Description: Offers a collection of 101 exercises to practice and improve your Pandas skills in Python.

Title: Kaggle
Description: A website that hosts data science and machine learning competitions, along with tutorials and courses focused on data science and machine learning.
